headline: Gabelli Funds to Host 11th Annual Waste & Sustainability Symposium Thursday, April 3, 2025
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., March 31, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Gabelli Funds, LLC, will host the 11th Annual Waste & Sustainability Symposium on Thursday, April 3, 2025 at the Harvard Club in New York City. This timely conference will feature presentations by senior management of leading companies, with an emphasis on industry dynamics, new technologies, and company fundamentals. Agenda: 7:50 AMOpening RemarksTony Bancroft – Gabelli FundsHanna Howard – Gabelli Funds 8:00Toppoint Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: TOPP

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 to Brush Off
summary: While the S&P 500 includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
